title: OT101: Threadversarial Collaboropen
summary:
Key ideas:
- This post is an open thread where readers can discuss anything they want.
- The author provides updates on SSC meetups and sidebar ads.
- The author also announces the upcoming Adversarial Collaboration contest and lists the teams that have registered so far.

Key learnings:
- Readers can participate in the Adversarial Collaboration contest by emailing the author to register.
- Triplebyte is a free job search service for programmers.
- Mixtiles is a tech startup looking for a remote senior data analyst, and Bubble is a tech startup looking for NYC-based software engineers.

Key questions:
- The author does not ask any key questions in this post.
